title: Update Google site verification meta tag content to exact value

requirements.text: Replace the existing Google site verification meta tag content in frontend/index.html from 'content="PASTE-YOUR-NEW-CODE-HERE"' to 'content="3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7"'

quotes:
Replace the existing Google verification meta tag in frontend/index.html head section with this exact one:

<meta name="google-site-verification" content="3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7" />

acceptanceCriteria: The meta tag in frontend/index.html must have the exact content attribute value '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'
The meta tag must remain in the <head> section
The meta tag name attribute must remain 'google-site-verification'
No other HTML structure in index.html should be modified

constraints: Do not modify any other meta tags or HTML elements in frontend/index.html
Preserve the exact formatting and structure of the meta tag
nonGoals: Modifying SEO or Open Graph meta tags
